text: (Maṉitarkaḷē! Camātāṉamum amaitiyum ēṟpaṭṭu) nāṭu cīrtiruntiya piṉṉar atil viṣamam ceyyātīrkaḷ. (Iṟaivaṉuṭaiya taṇṭaṉaikku) payantum, (avaṉuṭaiya caṉmāṉattai) virumpiyum, avaṉiṭam pirārttaṉai ceyyuṅkaḷ. Niccayamāka allāhvuṭaiya aruḷ, naṉmai ceyyum aḻakiya kuṇamuṭaiyavarkaḷukku mika camīpattilirukkiṟatu
